title: Bug 115960: Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
description: When retrieving datetime values from a table and displaying them in different types of items (dynamic text item and data/text item), the format of the datetime is inconsistent. This bug report aims to address the inconsistency and ensure that all items display the same format of datetime values.
OB: Datetime values retrieved from the table and displayed in dynamic text item and data/text item are shown in different formats.
EB: The expected behavior is that all items (dynamic text item, data item, and text item) display the datetime values in the same format.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the form editor
2. Insert a dynamic text item, a data item, and a text item
3. Configure the dynamic text item to retrieve a datetime value from a table
4. Configure the data item to retrieve the same datetime value from the same table
5. Configure the text item to display the value entered in step 3
6. Save and preview the form
7. Observe the formatting of the datetime values in each item
